body: Not joking. Avicus has the best. A few weeks ago, i was in MCSG and I said "guyz im using hax. Im using aimbot cuz im a haxor" a couple minutes later, i was tempbanned  for a week. On Avicus, this isnt breaking a rule cuz our staff is pretty dang smart.... thanks avicus staff, for helping the communtiy for free and making the server a better place :c

replies.body: I used to play on a server where I was staff. A few months ago I was demodded for a reason that I will only explain if people ask why. Anyway, while I was staff on that server I was very dedicated. I see a lot of dedications with the Avicus staff and I love that, they are all so friendly and do what they can to keep the server the best. The server I used to play on, now has staff that abuse. I never see abusing or staff power tripping on Avicus. This server truely has the best staff in my opinion of playing ;)
